rows.label: tev024401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Pepper about her company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Pepper if she has any interesting news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Pepper about Meredith & Co. weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Pepper about Nopon Commerce Guild weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Pepper about Six Stars weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Pepper about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Have you noticed the couple of office buildings in the
commercial district?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0002
rows.name:
That's where my company is, and where I work under
our president, Wilbur.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0003
rows.name:
To be honest, we wanted to base the company in the
arms manufacturers' building in the administrative
district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0004
rows.name:
But we were told that arms developers were the
preferred tenants, so we had to abandon that plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Even though it's OUR company that handles the sale
and distribution of the weapons made there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0008
rows.name: These Miralife Cards are going to be big.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0009
rows.name:
Have you seen them? They have beautiful illustrations
of indigens, the likes of which I've never laid eyes on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0010
rows.name:
And each one has a description that talks about the
creature in great detail. The information can be useful,
and sometimes even quite funny![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0011
rows.name:
I never saw such exciting trading cards back on
Earthâ€”I bet they'll be huge here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0012
rows.name:
If you don't want to be left behind, you should get as
many of them as you can![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0013
rows.name:
Hmm? What about me? Heh, well...
I'm going to convince Wilbur to buy them for me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Meredith & Co. weapons were developed based on
reverse-engineered Ganglion weaponry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0016
rows.name:
They apparently damage their targets with something
called "ether energy."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Natural indigens like beasts and insects seem to be
particularly vulnerable to ether energy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0018
rows.name:
The company faces some stiff competition,
but I wouldn't be surprised to see their products
start to catch on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Personally I find their designs to be quite grotesque,
but there seem to be plenty of BLADEs who enjoy that
sort of thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0022
rows.name:
The Nopon Commerce Guild specializes in weapons
that attack with flame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0031
rows.name:
So if you're wielding one against a foe who's weak
to fire, you've got the upper hand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0032
rows.name: Those Nopon make for pretty tough businessmen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0033
rows.name:
So no matter how high the quality of their products,
people who think they'll make a lot of money selling
them are in for a tough fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0034
rows.name:
If you fall for any of the Nopon negotiating tricks,
you'll end up seeing all your profits flow straight back
to the Nopon Commerce Guild![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Wrothian-made katanas are renowned for their
sharp, keen edges.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0035
rows.name:
They tend to be difficult to wield, but make up for it
with sheer destructive power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0036
rows.name:
Their products also have a vaguely eastern design,
if you're into that sort of thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0037
rows.name:
They'll probably sell like gangbusters among all the
BLADEs who grew up loving ninjas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Our company would definitely be interested in helping
them bring more products to the New LA arms market.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0026
rows.name:
Wilbur has resigned from our company,
which makes me the new president.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0027
rows.name:
I've been praised for my foresight, so I intend to
compete by better predicting marketplace trends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0028
rows.name:
Better yet, I intend to create those trends and have
my company at the center of the movements that are
sweeping New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024401_MSG0029
rows.name:
As to how exactly I'm going to do that...
I'm afraid that's a trade secret![ST:wait ]
